Discover your perfect wash

Finding the right washer means finding the one that perfectly complements your home, lifestyle and budget. That’s why our washers are specially designed to save you time, cut down on energy costs and deliver an even deeper clean with every load. And as America’s most reliable line of home appliances, you can count on LG to make laundry day more effortless than ever before.

Laundry day, your way

Life’s messes come in all shapes and sizes, and so should your washer. From traditional and straightforward to modern and space-saving, explore our top models to find a solution that best fits your space and laundry habits.

Front Load

Designed for large loads and small spaces. Get more from your laundry room by stacking your front load on top of a compatible LG dryer to maximize floor space. Plus, save energy with less water usage, while still getting the impressive clean you expect. Learn More

Shop Now

Top Load

Tough on stains but easy on upkeep. Choose our low-profile impeller option for an open inner tub and water current-powered cleaning or our traditional agitator option with a central post and multiple fins for 4-way wash action and a deeper clean. Learn More

Shop Now

Washer Dryer Combos

Save on space without compromising on speed or power. Our all-in-one Washtower™ and WashCombo™ solutions will change the way you clean, bringing you the latest innovative smart features while keeping your laundry room clear and ready for action.

Shop Now

LG Top Load Washers

Available Colors

Impeller Capacity

Cycles

Impeller

A low-profile mechanism that creates currents of water to move clothes through the wash tub and cause them to rub against one another, removing stubborn spots and stains.

Built-in Intelligence

Our built-in AI technology automatically selects optimal wash and dry motions and settings based on fabric type.

EasyUnload™

An angled ergonomic front design puts the entire tub of your top load washer within easy reach.

TurboWash®

More jets mean a shorter cycle time, no matter the size of the load.

ezDispense™

Fill the detergent and fabric softener reservoirs once and you're set for multiple cycles.

Water Faucet

4-Way® Agitator Model

A central post and specially designed fins which create a unique 4-way wash action for a powerful yet gentle clean in even less time.

RELIABILITY

Wash with confidence

Did you know it can cost between $300 and $500 to repair an appliance?1 It’s true—that’s why it helps to buy from brands you can count on. See why LG has always been the trusted choice for performance and dependability.

CONSUMER REPORTS

Rated, reliable and recommended

LG is consistently ranked #1 by Consumer Reports for our reliability, performance and customer satisfaction.* See Top Load Report

See Front Load Report

DUAL-INVERTER MOTORS

Power. Precision. Peace of mind.

Select LG washers include a 10-year manufacturer's limited warranty on our inverter direct drive motor for positively unmatched efficiency and durability.

*WM5500HVA, DLGX5501V, and WT8405CB are recommended by Consumer Reports. Consumer Reports does not endorse products or services.

¹

Based on LG’s out of warranty repair services in 2023.

²

Based on independent testing in normal cycle with TurboWash® option, 10 lb. load (June 2020).

³

Based on 9-13 lb. loads in normal mode, up to 14 loads when using detergent and softener; up to 25 loads when using both compartments to dispense detergent only. Always use HE (High-Efficiency) detergent with this washer. Use the ezDispense® Nozzle Clean function to periodically clean the reservoirs or before changing the softener reservoir to a detergent reservoir and vice versa.
